ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Average of avoidance scores (slinky, fish, water log, dome, animal fan, bubble duck)
Sum of avoidance scores (slinky, fish, water log, dome, animal fan, bubble duck)
Average of seeking scores (slinky, fish, water log, dome, animal fan, bubble duck)
Sum of seeking scores (slinky, fish, water log, dome, animal fan, bubble duck)
Average of social orienting scores (name call, social tap, wave)
Sum of social orienting scores (name call, social tap, wave)
Average of non-social orienting scores (sound stick, air puff, pen light)
Sum of non-social orienting scores (sound stick, air puff, pen light)
Average of orienting scores across all orienting items (name call, social tap, wave, sound stick, air puff, pen light)
Sum of orienting scores across all orienting items (name call, social tap, wave, sound stick, air puff, pen light)
Average of auditory modality scores (sound stick, name call)
Sum of auditory modality scores (sound stick, name call)
Average of tactile modality score (air puff, social tap)
Sum of tactile modality scores (air puff, social tap)
Average of visual modality scores (pen light, wave)
Sum of visual modality scores (pen light, wave)
Average of defensiveness scores across all items (name call, social tap, wave, sound stick, air puff, pen light)
Sum of defensiveness scores across all items (name call, social tap, wave, sound stick, air puff, pen light)
Average of defensiveness scores for social orienting items (name call, social tap, wave)
Sum of defensiveness scores for social orienting items (name call, social tap, wave)
Average of defensiveness scores for non-social orienting items (sound stick, air puff, pen light)
Sum of defensiveness scores for non-social orienting items (sound stick, air puff, pen light)
Average of defensiveness scores for auditory modality items (sound stick, name call)
Sum of defensiveness scores for auditory modality items (sound stick, name call)
Average of defensiveness scores for tactile modality items (air puff, social tap)
Sum of defensiveness scores for tactile modality items (air puff, social tap)
Average of defensiveness scores for visual modality items (pen light, wave)
Sum of defensiveness scores for visual modality items (pen light, wave)
